unnormalised: Arre yaar, tumchem PAN card ABCDE1234F tumchea Aadhaar numberak 31/03 adim link korunk visrunk naka. Atam tem zuroori asa, na zalyar, tumkam ITR file korpak problem zatle. Ani, tumi tumchem GSTIN 09AAAAA0000A1Z5 naveen amendment zalea uprant update kelem? Tax season ekdom mathyacho dukho!
normalised: arre yaar, tumchea P-A-N card A-B-C-D-E-one-two-three-four-F-ak tumchea Aadhaar number-an thirty first march-achea adim link korunk visrunk naka. Atam tem zaroori asa, na zalear, tumchea I-T-R file korpak problem zateli. Ani, tumchea G-S-T-I-N zero-nine-triple-A-A-A-zero-zero-zero-zero-A-one-Z-five latest amendment-achea uprant update kela? Tax season ekdom dokdukicho!
text: Arre yaar, tumchem PAN card ABCDE1234F tumchea Aadhaar numberak 31/03 adim link korunk visrunk naka. Atam tem zuroori asa, na zalyar, tumkam ITR file korpak problem zatle. Ani, tumi tumchem GSTIN 09AAAAA0000A1Z5 naveen amendment zalea uprant update kelem? Tax season ekdom mathyacho dukho!
